title: ITC Grounch
content: Hi, I want to buy ITC Grouch, but this font is no longer available on any website even on itc site. Does anybody knows if this type is still for sale?
author: gillesbeaujard

comments.content:
Edit-A-Bit.: Sorry, I just found this, when searching for ’Grouch’.:  
_’..This ITC font, digitized by Bitstream, is no longer available due to ITC’s termination of licensing agreements with many resellers in January 2001..’  
\> [www.myfonts.com/PurchaseOptions?familyid=332&id[]=860](http://web.archive.org/web/20090625061254/http:/www.myfonts.com/PurchaseOptions?familyid=332&id%5B%5D=860)_

\> [www.fontware.com/section/products/fonts/SEURLF/ASP/SFS/..](http://web.archive.org/web/20090625061254/http:/www.fontware.com/section/products/fonts/SEURLF/ASP/SFS/SUITCASENUMBER.000678/SFE/standardfonts.htm)

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20090625061254/http:/www.formlos.net/)
Gilles, drop me a line, maybe I can help.
Does anyone know if ITC Grouch is available yet? Thank you very much.

From what I understood from ITC - they no longer have the rights to make or sell it. There seems to be a legal hassle behind it, one they wouldn’t tell me about.

In the past both Image Club Graphics and Bitstream had digitized and sold it, but sorry, ICG is long gone and Bitstream no longer sells it.

There use to be a copy for the taking online - but even that has been removed.

This would be a wonderful time for a 1/1 since neither wdpartnerdesign nor gilles have email/website or send messages....

If you need something typeset - just ask.
Recent Grouch-spotting article by Rob Giampietro: [The Fonts of Summer](http://web.archive.org/web/20090625061254/http:/www.designobserver.com/archives/027341.html).
